lines.text: Funny how a good kick in the pants will make a guy's head work.
Hey Al, do you know Mrs. Franklin?
Well, I knew a Mrs. Chili Franklin once.
Well, I'm just not quite sure, ya see, she's been dead about 12 years now.
Well, you don't care what you ride in, or who sees you, do you?
Well, if I'm not particular, why remind me of it?
I haven't hit anything for three whole days.
Well, we'll have to get some kind of a medal for you!
